question.question: My dear fellow, dost thou recall the name of the great treasure sought by Thorin Oakenshield and his company, which lay beneath the lonely mountain, a prize coveted by both Dwarves and Elves alike?
question.text: My dear fellow, dost thou recall the name of the great treasure sought by Thorin Oakenshield and his company, which lay beneath the lonely mountain, a prize coveted by both Dwarves and Elves alike?

feedback.message: Excellent! Your wisdom rivals that of the White Council itself!
next_steps: Continue your journey through the deeper mysteries of Middle-earth.
Share your wisdom with others who seek to understand these ancient tales.

question.question: My dear fellow, what is the name of the Shire-dwelling Hobbit who bears the One Ring on a perilous quest?

question.question: What is the color of the banner that the Elves of Lothlórien raised to signal their presence in Middle-earth?
question.text: What is the color of the banner that the Elves of Lothlórien raised to signal their presence in Middle-earth?

feedback.message: Even the wisest cannot see all ends. Let us explore this matter further.
feedback.explanation: The lore of Middle-earth tells us that Blue.
next_steps: Consult the ancient texts for more knowledge on this subject.
Reflect on the connections between different realms of Middle-earth's lore.
